page.title: 03Brackley's local news
page.content: On an estate in Brackley some old cars and a coach have been dumped. They are no longer any use and have been propped up on bricks as they have no tyres. A Councillor said that it made the estate look untidy . As well as that, the Councillor felt that rusting vehicles were dangerous in housing estates. Lots of babies have been born in Brackley Cottage Hospital. One nurse who has worked in the twelve-bed hospital for twenty-four years is retiring this year. They call her "Super Nurse". She says that delivering babies is a miracle and that no two babies are the same. She has been a nurse since 1943.
